text: Hari Anand Barari (born 1929)http://www.dkagencies.com/doc/from/1023/to/21330/Author/Barari,%20H.%20A.,%201929-/Books- By-Indian-Author.html was an Indian Intelligence Bureau officer and politician. He was Governor of Haryana from February 1987 to February 1989. He was born in Bikrampur. ==References== Category:Governors of Haryana Category:Living people Category:1929 births
title: Hari Anand Barari
